Product.title: Product
Product.description: Represents an item available for sale in the store.

description.description: A detailed description of the product.

category.description: The category the product belongs to.

stock.description: The current stock level of the product.

imageId.description: The ID for the placeholder image of the product.

rating.description: The average customer rating of the product.

reviewCount.description: The total number of reviews for the product.

UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Stores public and non-sensitive information about a user.

role.description: The user's role in the application.

CartItem.title: Cart Item
CartItem.description: Represents a product that a user has added to their shopping cart.

quantity.description: The quantity of the product in the cart.

addedAt.description: The timestamp when the item was added to the cart.

/products/{productId}.description: Collection of all products available in the store.

/users/{userId}.description: Collection where each document represents a user's profile, keyed by their Firebase Auth UID.

/users/{userId}/cart/{productId}.description: A sub-collection within each user's document storing items in their shopping cart. The document ID is the product ID.
